label: Behavior 78375493
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 54.441232 + 0.00015 × t + 0.00004 × t², lon(t) ≈ 13.70429 + 0.00018 × t + 0.00002 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
